thread.title: Investor’s Guide: Investing in HDFC equity
thread.title_full: Investor’s Guide: Investing in HDFC equity

title: Investor’s Guide: Investing in HDFC equity
text: Investor’s Guide: Investing in HDFC equity 30 Aug 2015, 11:42AM IST Copy URL Embed Dhirendra Kumar, CEO of Value Research guides the investors to invest in the HDFC Equity fund by suggesting to stay put with it. The reason Dhirendra gives is that the fund has though underperformed in last one year, but it has always given good returns before that. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 161 views
